main_content.headline: Unlock your body's potential in paradise. Experience deep spinal decompression and release chronic tension in our tropical wellness sanctuary.
main_content.sub_headline: PRAVILO.club - TROPICAL WELLNESS & AUTHENTIC GRAVITY DECOMPRESSION THERAPY
main_content.introductory_offer: Experience the Traditional Russian Method for Spinal Health in a pristine tropical environment. Relieve chronic back and joint pain while surrounded by healing ocean air and natural beauty. Increase flexibility and range of motion through our unique combination of ancient wisdom and tropical wellness practices.

what_is_pravilo.title: "Pravilo": Ancient Russian Method for Modern Healing
what_is_pravilo.text:
The "Pravilo" system is a traditional Russian method for spinal decompression and joint health that has been practiced for generations. This ancient Slavic approach to wellness focuses on natural body mechanics and the healing power of gravity and body weight.

"Pravilo" is a unique ancient Slavic simulator that allows for deep decompression of the spine and joints. It works through natural horizontal traction, where the impact on the entire musculoskeletal system is evenly distributed under the mass of one's own body (with the possibility of adjusting the load). This helps relieve compression from intervertebral discs, free pinched nerves, and improve blood circulation.

The system gently stretches muscles, ligaments, and tendons, increasing flexibility and joint mobility. In just a few minutes, you will feel stress and fatigue disappear, replaced by energy, lightness, and harmony. This is not magic, but a time-tested method that allows you to unleash ancient strength and become stronger not only physically but also in life. The effectiveness of the "Pravilo" simulator has been proven by functional and practical research, and now it's available in a tropical setting where the natural environment enhances the healing process.

about_misha.title: About Mikhail Bondaruk
about_misha.introduction: My journey began with an interest in the body and health. I studied at a sports college, then at a physical education university in Moscow. But the most important lessons I learned not from books, but from living experience — through travels, searches, and personal experiments with body and consciousness.

journey.title: Life Path
journey.text: From a young age, I was drawn to freedom and to exploring the limits of human capabilities. For many years, I hitchhiked across Russia and post-Soviet countries, traveling almost the entire southern coast of the country. Then I went further — to Asia. I visited Thailand, Malaysia, Indonesia, Cambodia, Vietnam. For a long time, I lived in India and South Korea. These travels taught me lightness, the ability to adapt, and to see beauty in simplicity.

current_practices.title: Current Practices
current_practices.text:
Currently, I combine several directions.
I work as a massage master — relieving spasms, working through trigger points, restoring body mobility. I have an individual approach: sometimes gently, sometimes deeply, but always with attention to the person.
I teach the Alpha Gravity system and create Pravilo simulators that help develop strength, flexibility, and ligament health.
I practice hardening — I walk in shorts and a T-shirt all year round, even in winter.
I use breathing techniques, prayers, and internal gratitude practices. I believe that health begins not only with the body but also with the soul, with an inner connection to God and the universe.

other_talents.title: Other Talents
other_talents.text:
Yes, I cannot limit myself to just one direction.
I am a musician, playing the jaw harp and harmonica. Music for me is a way to connect with myself and people.
I engage in handicrafts — creating jewelry from wire and crystals. For me, it's a meditative process in which unique things are born.
I love to travel — it continues to be a part of me.

outdoor_adventures.title: Tropical Nature Connection & Adventure Services
outdoor_adventures.description: Connect with nature and discover hidden gems through guided experiences that combine physical wellness with environmental awareness in tropical settings.

services.name: Bamboo Forest Trekking
services.description: Explore ancient bamboo groves on guided nature walks. Learn about local flora, practice mindful walking, and experience the therapeutic benefits of forest bathing in a tropical setting.

services.name: Waterfall Discovery Tours
services.description: Discover hidden waterfalls and natural pools. Perfect for those seeking adventure, relaxation, and connection with pristine nature in tropical environments.

services.name: Sunset Mountain Hiking
services.description: Moderate hiking trails leading to panoramic viewpoints. Experience breathtaking sunsets while building endurance and connecting with the tropical landscape.

services.name: Beach Camping Experience
services.description: Overnight beach camping with traditional fire-making, stargazing, and sunrise meditation. Learn survival skills while enjoying pristine coastal environments.

services.name: Coastal Rock Climbing
services.description: Beginner-friendly rock climbing on natural coastal formations. Build strength, confidence, and enjoy spectacular ocean views.

handcrafted_artisan.title: Handcrafted Artisan Creations
handcrafted_artisan.description: Unique handmade jewelry and functional art pieces created with natural materials and traditional techniques.

services.name: Wire-Wrapped Crystal Jewelry
services.description: Custom jewelry pieces featuring natural crystals, stones, and metals. Each piece is individually crafted using traditional wire-wrapping techniques.

services.name: Wooden Pipe Crafting
services.description: Hand-carved wooden pipes made from sustainable hardwoods. Each piece is unique, featuring natural wood grain patterns and ergonomic design.

services.name: Coral & Shell Jewelry
services.description: Ocean-inspired jewelry using ethically sourced coral and shell materials. Perfect for beach lovers and nature enthusiasts.

services.name: Custom Design Consultation
services.description: Personal consultation to create unique pieces tailored to your style, energy, and intentions. Perfect for special occasions or personal meaning.

wellness_therapies.title: Holistic Wellness & Bodywork
wellness_therapies.description: Professional therapeutic services focused on restoring balance, relieving tension, and promoting natural healing processes.

services.name: Deep Tissue Massage
services.description: Therapeutic massage targeting chronic tension, muscle knots, and postural imbalances. Combines various techniques for maximum relief and relaxation.

services.name: Spinal Alignment Therapy
services.description: Gentle, non-invasive techniques to improve spinal alignment and joint mobility. Focuses on natural body mechanics and postural correction.

services.name: Energy Balancing Session
services.description: Holistic approach combining massage, energy work, and breathing techniques to restore natural energy flow and emotional balance.

services.name: Sports Recovery Massage
services.description: Specialized massage for athletes and active individuals. Focuses on muscle recovery, injury prevention, and performance optimization.

spiritual_practices.title: Ancient Wisdom & Spiritual Practices
spiritual_practices.description: Traditional practices and initiations rooted in ancient wisdom, adapted for modern seekers on their spiritual journey.

services.name: Sacred Fire Ceremony
services.description: Traditional fire ceremony for purification, intention setting, and spiritual connection. Experience the transformative power of sacred flames.

services.name: Nature Initiation Ritual
services.description: Powerful initiation ceremony in natural settings. Connect with elemental forces and receive guidance for your spiritual path.

services.name: Ancestral Wisdom Circle
services.description: Ceremony honoring ancestors and connecting with ancestral wisdom. Learn traditional practices and receive ancestral guidance.

services.name: Elemental Balancing Ritual
services.description: Sacred ritual to balance the four elements within yourself. Experience harmony and alignment with natural forces.

services.name: Threshold Crossing Ceremony
services.description: Sacred ceremony for life transitions, new beginnings, and personal transformation. Mark important life changes with intention and ceremony.

services.name: Sacred Plant Medicine Circle
services.description: Traditional plant medicine ceremony for healing, insight, and spiritual connection. Experience the wisdom of sacred plants in a safe, guided setting.

services.name: Moon Cycle Ceremonies
services.description: Ceremonies aligned with lunar cycles for intention setting, release, and manifestation. Connect with natural rhythms and cosmic energies.

services.name: Sacred Sound Healing
services.description: Traditional sound healing using ancient instruments and vocal techniques. Experience the healing power of sacred sounds and vibrations.

services.name: Vision Quest Preparation
services.description: Preparation and guidance for personal vision quests and spiritual journeys. Learn traditional practices for deep spiritual exploration.

services.name: Community Healing Circle
services.description: Group healing ceremony for community bonding, collective healing, and shared spiritual experience. Build connections through sacred practice.
